issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

When I posted the application made for the iPad 1.5.2, the response of the review of
application was:

"The non-public API that is included in your application is initWithWindow:. If you Have set the method in your source code with the name The Same this API, we Suggest
altering your name method so that it no longer collides with Apple's private API to
Avoid Being flagged you application in future submissions. "

I searched for this Palava is encountering it in the file TiUIWindowProxy.m.

I'm sure this is critical and should be treated with the utmost speed, as
means that no application is approved by Apple.

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: 1.5.2 - initWithWindow - Private API rejected by Apple - CRITICAL

But 'initWithTiWinodw:' is close enough. https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/14c019adc139...
